title: Bug? Did the mission - But it wasn't marked as complete.
body:
Hey there! 

I'm currently working on the Worlds Mission, specifically the one which requires an Ashe in the game and killing several drakes.
I just won a game with an Ashe as an adc and we also managed to kill several drakes but none of it has shown up as complete or in-progress. Neither do any of my champion kiss/assists. 

Is there someone who could please take a look at this? Feel free to check my most recent match. Thank you!

replies.body: It looks like you changed your icon to the SG Ahri icon instead of the Worlds icon. You need to have one of the Worlds icons equipped in order to make progress with these missions.
Do you have a world's icon on? I'm not sure if there you need to buy the icons from the bundles or if there is a free one, but you need to have one equipped.
